players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "Accusing me without evidence is dangerous for the town. Diana, why are you so quick to point fingers? Let's focus on finding the real threat together."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. I am the detective and my investigation is clear. Voting him out now is the only way to protect the town."
Charlie: "Accusing me solely based on your word, Diana, is risky. If you're truly the detective, why reveal your role so quickly? Let's gather more information before rushing to vote."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
